comments.default_start_date: Fixed start date (YYYY-MM-DD). Used when use_start_of_year is false
comments.default_days_back: Number of days back from today for new installations (ignored if use_start_of_year is true)
comments.full_refresh_days_back: Number of days back for full refresh operations
comments.use_start_of_year: If true, defaults to January 1st of current year for new installations
comments.incremental_buffer_days: Number of days to go back from last order date for incremental updates
